Title: Relates to requiring the commissioner of health to establish means of educating proprietors and employees of public eating establishments about food allergens
Summary: Requires the commissioner of health to establish means of educating proprietors and employees of public eating establishments about food allergens.
LawCode: Amd ยง1352-b, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to food allergen information
